docker.name: RUN
docker.args: apt-get update && apt-get install -y libc6-dev --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
docker.raw: RUN apt-get update && apt-get install -y libc6-dev --no-install-recommends && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

docker.name: RUN
docker.args: mkdir /opt/jruby   && curl -fSL https://repo1.maven.org/maven2/org/jruby/jruby-dist/${JRUBY_VERSION}/jruby-dist-${JRUBY_VERSION}-bin.tar.gz -o /tmp/jruby.tar.gz   && echo "$JRUBY_SHA256 /tmp/jruby.tar.gz" | sha256sum -c -   && tar -zx --strip-components=1 -f /tmp/jruby.tar.gz -C /opt/jruby   && rm /tmp/jruby.tar.gz   && update-alternatives --install /usr/local/bin/ruby ruby /opt/jruby/bin/jruby 1
docker.raw: RUN mkdir /opt/jruby   && curl -fSL https://repo1.maven.org/maven2/org/jruby/jruby-dist/${JRUBY_VERSION}/jruby-dist-${JRUBY_VERSION}-bin.tar.gz -o /tmp/jruby.tar.gz   && echo "$JRUBY_SHA256 /tmp/jruby.tar.gz" | sha256sum -c -   && tar -zx --strip-components=1 -f /tmp/jruby.tar.gz -C /opt/jruby   && rm /tmp/jruby.tar.gz   && update-alternatives --install /usr/local/bin/ruby ruby /opt/jruby/bin/jruby 1

docker.name: RUN
docker.args: gem install bundler rake net-telnet xmlrpc
docker.raw: RUN gem install bundler rake net-telnet xmlrpc
